name: Task 1: Add Data to Contact Card Database

input_spec.help: the last name of the person
input_spec.name: lastName

input_spec.help: the first name of the person
input_spec.name: firstName

input_spec.help: this is the date it was updated
input_spec.name: dateLastUpdated

input_spec.help: this is the indusall the relevant information about Job of the contact, for example Roles, job title, industrytry or department of the person.
input_spec.name: jobDescription

input_spec.help: This is the business relationships of the contact. For example work relationships specifically, reports to, works with, supervisor of, all work related.
input_spec.name: businessRelationships

input_spec.help: these are other comments on the person
input_spec.name: otherComments

input_spec.help: this is the appearance of the person.
input_spec.name: appearance

input_spec.help: This is the personal relationships of the contact. For example spouse, kids, relatives, uncles, aunts, friends, friends with.
input_spec.name: personalRelationships

input_spec.help: This is the category of the contact. Example sales lead, colleague, client, family/friend, business.
input_spec.name: contactCategory

input_spec.help: This is the source of the contact.
input_spec.name: source

input_spec.help: all details about introduction. main key word -here is "intro", "introduced", "introduction". for example if the contact introduced me to someone or information about other person who introduced me to this contact.
input_spec.name: introduction

output_spec.help: this is the result of the query
output_spec.name: response
